markdownRemark.html:
Blep is the fastest growing, leading blockchain intelligence platform, making alternative data accessible to humans, AI, and everyone in between. We focus on real time blockchain and blockchain-adjacent data, and offer a library of over 50,000 real time streams of raw metrics and insights. Our consumer beta is available at https://analytics.blep.ai.

Blep is a small but ambitious team consisting of builders, researchers, and adventurers with extensive experience both in and out of the blockchain industry. Our team is fully decentralized and we plan to have a global presence.

Feel free to check out our Twitter (@blepai) and Telegram (@blepai) for latest updates.

Job Description

We are looking for a backend engineer to assist with scaling up Blep.

You will have a chance to develop professionally and personally while working on disruptive solutions in a new trillion dollar industry. There is no geographic requirement.

Potential roles and responsibilities:

  • Develop low latency programs
  • Collaborate with engineering team to design and write common libraries for data cleaning, processing, and transacting
  • API design
  • Optimizing data storage, transfer, and retrieval for large amounts of data
  • Quick paced and wide variety of responsibilities
  • Utilize testing to ensure reliable software

Requirements

  • 5+ years of software engineering experience
  • Interest in working on backend systems, from APIs and business logic to optimizing database transactions
  • Interest in modeling complex domains and building resilient systems to support real world applications at scale
  • A proven track record of executing complex, medium-to-large feature releases that span multiple months
  • Strong software development skills and computer science fundamentals
  • Interest in working with other engineering teams and cross functional partners
  • High level of interest in blockchain/decentralized/distributed technology
  • Self-learner, as there are updates in the blockchain industry every day
  • Our team speaks in English for all technical matters

Preferred/Bonus

  • Experience with data pipelines
  • Time series databases
  • Ethereum / EVM / Solidity
  • Advanced SQL
  • Interest in cryptocurrency industry: Consensus models, token economics, etc
  • Trading experience
  • A Github with code samples!

Additional openings

  • backend engineer
  • UI/frontend/data visualization engineer
  • quantitative finance
  • Blockchain engineer
  • Devops engineer
  • crypto trader
  • Designer
  • NLP / data science / machine learning role

frontmatter.meta_description: We are searching for an experienced backend engineer ready to  contribute in taking the existing product to the next level. You would be  expected to contribute to the development of APIs, microservices, and new  features, all in the context of a distributed system with a high load of data from blockchain nodes.
